Author: bluediner
Text: I binged for the first time in two months last Sunday, I went up about 4 pounds and then down 3 pretty quickly and now iâ€™m back up again?? despite keeping the same deficit?? idk weight sucks lol

Author: tea-addicted-taemint
Text: It'll mostly be food weight and water weight (bloating.) It'll probably go away once you have a bowel movement!   I don't know the specifics of your body, but if your TDEE is ~1500 then a 2.5k binge only puts you at a relatively small surplus. Don't be too hard on yourself op! We've all been there.
